title: Deck & Patio Design Guide (Better Homes and Gardens Home)
features: Whether it's poolside fun or outdoor entertaining,

by Meredith Books, can help you create an outdoor venue that works for your lifestyle. Including over 200 photos filled with great ideas, this book will provide information on material choices, stylish furnishings and more. Plus, you'll even learn some tips on the process of hiring contractors, gathering bids and developing a budget.
description: The iconic BETTER HOMES AND GARDENS brand is one of America's most trusted sources for information on cooking, gardening, home improvement, home design, decorating, and crafting. Today, the brand encompasses books, magazines, and digital media.
